column3: Everest is the highest mountain {{c1::in}} the world.
This is a good place to eat. They say it's the best restaurant {{c1::in}} town.
For me spring is a very busy time. It's the busiest time {{c1::of}} the year.
Brazil is the largest country {{c1::in}} South America.
I like the morning. I think it's the best part {{c1::of}} the day.
Helen is a very good teacher. She's the best teacher {{c1::in}} the school.
